transcript:
Customer: Hello. Hello.
Executive: Hello sir, good morning.
Customer: Good morning.
Executive: Ha Javed ji baat kar rahe hain na se.
Customer: Ha bhai bol raha hun.
Executive: Ha sir main Manish bol raha tha sir India mart head office se aapka account manage kar raha hun.
Customer: Ji bataiye.
Executive: Ha sir kal aapne sir call kiya tha sir kya issue aa raha hai sir aapne kuch complaint nahi nahi mujhe mujhe kisi product ki need thi waha se koi reply nahi aa raha tha.
Executive: Achcha achcha to matlab requirement aaya tha sir aapko waha se hai na.
Customer: Na na na na na mujhe need thi actually kisi product ki.
Executive: Achcha achcha aapko need thi sir.
Customer: Ji. Achcha achcha kis cheez ki need thi sir ko aapko?
Customer: Ek ek tray hoti hai.
Executive: Paper wali.
Customer: Achcha ek paper wali ki sir.
Customer: Na na na machine ki nahi.
Executive: Tray ki tray ki ha tray ki hi requirement thi.
Executive: Tray ki sir wo solve ho gaya sir?
Customer: Na abhi to koi contact nahi ho paya sir.
Executive: Achcha achcha to ek kaam karta hun main aapko sir aaj agar kuch milta hai to main aapko whatsapp pe send karta hun link theek hai sir.
Customer: Okay okay thank you. Usse related. Aur sir koi issue aa raha hai use karne mein main dekh raha hun sir abhi aap barik sir consume nahi kar rahe hain sir bilkul bhi aap main dekh raha hun active nahi hai sir.
Customer: Nahi nahi wo hota hai use hota rehta hai abhi pichle thoda si wo dusra kuch dusre kaam mein busy the to kam ho gaya tha.
Executive: Achcha aapke aapke bhai se bhi mera baat hua tha kuch din pehle wo ye bol rahe the sir ki wo barik ko matlab entertain nahi karte hain only inquiry aur call ko sir matlab dekhte hain aisa kuch.
Customer: Ha call to call to sare receive karte hain.
Executive: Ha. Thoda time ka issue rehta hai uske liye banda rakhna hai ek particular.
Executive: Achcha achcha banda theek hai theek hai kyunki sir abhi main dekh raha hun abhi jo aapka swing aapka main product jo hai wo swing machine hai sir hai na sir.
Customer: Na hamara to swing machine hai but mujhe need jo hai na edge paper tray ki hai.
Executive: Achcha achcha ha to koi dikkat nahi hai main agar aapko India mart pe agar kuch dikhega to main aaj aapko whatsapp pe send karunga theek hai sir.
Customer: Okay thank you.
Executive: Ha ha aur
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needed a product, no reply received.

- Customer is not actively using IndiaMART.



Resolution:

- Executive will send a WhatsApp link if found.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- product, need, whatsapp, active
